column4: hello, what is a good program for ubuntu to create and burn a dvd from an avi?
hello, what is a good program for ubuntu to create and burn a dvd from an avi?
make a dvd compliant disc from an avi ?  dont know of one, without using a million cli tools...
to create a dvd movie playable in any standard consumer dvd player from an avi/mp4 movie file
the linux version of nero might be able to do it by now, i dont know...all i can suggest
or get a dvd player like mine that can play wmv/avi :)
daffy: i was going to burn some movies for friends as gifts
get a decent usenet account and download the dvd then :)
these are avi torrents of movies not out in theaters yet
i got that new clint eastwood movie to burn
yeah and they usually have a dvd made from em
which usenet would be better for...
i usually don't dl from usenet
torrents are ok but the uploading bs and the lifespan really grips my sh*t
my ispdoesn't  hold onto biinary usenet posts for very long and i don't want to ppay for usenet services
